text: wma ellamna rasulina mhmdana alsher, wama yanbaghi lah 'an yakun shaerana, ma hdha aladhi ja' bih 'iilaa dhikr yatadhakar bih 'uwlu alalbab, waquran byin aldlalt ealaa alhaqi walbatl, wadihatan ahkamh whikamh wmwaezh; liyundhir man kan hy alqalb mstnyr albsyrt, wayuhiqu aleadhab ealaa alkafirin ballh; li'anahum qamat ealayhim bialquran hujat allah albalght
